definition: to demand payment/to collect overdue payment
to invite/to provoke/to demand or ask for/to send armed forces to suppress/to denounce or condemn/to marry (a woman)/to discuss or study

sentences.english: They have rice cooking in their pots and no creditors knocking on their doors at midnight.
sentences.chinese: 他們鍋裏有米煮，沒有人半夜裏敲門來討賬。
